title: Why can't i open store on mac
body:
Never open my store on my mac, my friends with same version mac can open the store with the same client.

- can't open store
- black loading home page
- error report after close the app

find several people with the same problem but no solution provided.

replies.body:
>image failed to load

I'm starting to think the boards are screwed as well.

What ISP are you with? Have you tried [using an alternative DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq4) yet?
i tried the d.n.s with 8.8.8.8 and did flush the d.n.s  it just doesn't work
Have you tried [using administrative privileges to run League](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9)?
my computer is mac , i think administrative privileges is on windows

The link I provided you with was most definitely for Mac.

>**Mac Administrator Settings and File & Folder Permissions**

>League of Legends on the Mac requires you to have administrator privileges. You can manage user [...]

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9
